channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国最大的珍珠奶茶制造商蜜雪和古茗申请香港首次公开募股
item.description: China's leading bubble tea makers including Mixue Bingcheng and Guming are rushing to apply for first-time share sales in Hong Kong as companies in the fast-growing sector expand aggressively amid fierce competition.翻译:随着这个快速增长行业的公司在激烈的竞争中积极扩张，包括蜜雪冰城和古茗在内的中国领先珍珠奶茶制造商正争相申请在香港首次发售股票。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾军方称与美国第二次南海联合巡逻正在进行
item.description: The Philippines and the United States began a two-day joint patrol in the South China Sea on Wednesday, the Philippine military said in a statement.翻译:菲律宾军方在一份声明中表示，菲律宾和美国周三开始在南海进行为期两天的联合巡逻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉12月中国产电动汽车销量同比增长68.7%
item.description: U.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles (EVs) in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周三的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉12月份销售了94,139辆中国制造的电动汽车(EV)，同比增长68.7%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉12月中国产电动汽车销量同比增长68.7%
item.description: U.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周三的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉12月份销售了94,139辆中国制造的电动汽车，同比增长68.7%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 摩根士丹利12月外资加速抛售中国股市
item.description: Global long-only funds offloaded China equities at the fastest pace of 2023 in December as they rushed to meet redemption requests and to diversify away from the world's second-largest economy, according to Morgan Stanley analysts.翻译:摩根士丹利分析师表示，全球多头基金在 12 月以 2023 年最快的速度抛售中国股票，因为它们急于满足赎回要求并实现多元化，远离世界第二大经济体。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 中方表示愿向日本抗震救灾提供帮助
item.description: China is willing to provide necessary help to Japan on the massive earthquake that struck the country on New Year's Day, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中方愿就元旦发生的特大地震向日方提供必要帮助。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国顶级银行收紧对规模较小银行的风险敞口以遏制信贷风险
item.description: Some of China's top banks have sharpened scrutiny of smaller peers' asset quality and have tightened standards for interbank lending, three sources said, in an effort to curb credit risk as a deepening property debt crisis ripples through the economy.翻译:三名消息人士称，中国一些顶级银行加强了对规模较小银行资产质量的审查，并收紧了银行间拆借标准，以在不断加深的房地产债务危机波及整个经济之际遏制信贷风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国基金经理急于创建追踪新A50指数的基金
item.description: Chinese money managers are rushing to create funds tracking the newly-launched CSI A50 Index, which analysts say is a better reflection of China's economic landscape and government priorities than the country's stock benchmarks.翻译:中国的基金管理公司正忙于创建追踪新推出的沪深 A50 指数的基金，分析师表示，该指数比中国的股票基准更好地反映了中国的经济形势和政府的优先事项。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大选后中国可能对台湾采取“鹰派”军事压制
item.description: The arms race across the Taiwan Strait and Chinese military pressure against the island Beijing claims as its "sacred" territory is unlikely to end no matter who wins Taiwan's closely watched elections.翻译:无论谁赢得台湾备受关注的选举，台湾海峡的军备竞赛以及中国对北京声称其“神圣”领土的岛屿的军事压力都不太可能结束。
item.author: Yew Lun Tian, James Pomfret

item.title: 海外人士反驳香港对黎智英进行安全审判的指控
item.description: Several overseas activists, right campaigners and politicians named in a national security trial for Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai refuted allegations levelled by a government prosecutor in court that they colluded with him.翻译:在香港民主人士黎智英的国家安全审判中被点名的几名海外活动人士、右翼活动人士和政界人士驳斥了一名政府检察官在法庭上提出的关于他们与黎智英勾结的指控。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 比亚迪将向经销商发放20亿元奖励以助其完成销售目标--消息人士
item.description: BYD , which outsold Tesla in electric car sales globally for the first time in the fourth quarter, will hand out rewards totaling billions of yuan to its Chinese dealers, according to two dealers with knowledge of the matter.翻译:据两位知情经销商透露，第四季度全球电动汽车销量首次超过特斯拉的比亚迪将向其中国经销商发放总计数十亿元人民币的奖励。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国公布下一代航母的新图片
item.description: Chinese state media unveiled new images of China's most advanced aircraft carrier yet, including next generation launch tracks that can catapult a wider range of aircraft from its deck.翻译:中国官方媒体公布了中国迄今为止最先进航母的新图片，其中包括可以从甲板上弹射更多类型飞机的下一代发射轨道。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国官员敦促台湾人民在选举中做出“正确选择”
item.description: A senior Chinese official on Wednesday urged Taiwan's people to make a "correct choice" on the island's upcoming elections, which he described as being about peace and war, prosperity and decline.翻译:周三，一名中国高级官员敦促台湾人民在台湾即将举行的选举中做出“正确选择”，他称这次选举关系到和平与战争、繁荣与衰落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾在主要空军基地附近的岛屿上空发现中国气球
item.description: Three Chinese balloons flew across Taiwan and near an air base, the Taiwanese defence ministry said. Taiwan is on high alert for Chinese activities, both military and political, ahead of Jan. 13 elections.翻译:台湾国防部表示，三个中国气球飞越台湾并靠近一个空军基地。在 1 月 13 日选举之前，台湾对中国的军事和政治活动保持高度警惕。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴克莱因需求担忧而降级后，苹果跌至七周低点
item.description: Apple on Tuesday fell nearly 3.6% to a seven-week low after Barclays downgraded the shares of the world's most valuable company on concerns that demand for its devices from the iPhone to the Mac will remain weak in 2024.翻译:由于担心 2024 年从 iPhone 到 Mac 等苹果设备的需求仍将疲软，巴克莱银行下调了这家全球市值最高公司的股价评级，周二苹果股价下跌近 3.6%，至七周低点。
item.author: Aditya Soni, Medha Singh

item.title: 2023年中国打破高温记录，酷热天气从北到南烘烤城市
item.description: The heat in China was relenting in 2023 with temperature records broken from Beijing to Shanghai, echoing the global heatwave phenomena that also engulfed most of the world and raised more concerns about global climate change.翻译:2023年，中国的炎热天气有所缓解，从北京到上海的气温记录都被打破，这与同样席卷世界大部分地区的全球热浪现象相呼应，引发了人们对全球气候变化的更多担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉第四季度汽车交付量创历史新高，但中国比亚迪抢夺电动汽车头把交椅
item.description: Tesla delivered a record number of electric vehicles in the fourth quarter, beating market estimates and meeting its 2023 target, but lost its spot as the top EV maker by sales to China's BYD .翻译:特斯拉在第四季度交付了创纪录的电动汽车数量，超出了市场预期，并实现了 2023 年的目标，但由于销量输给了中国比亚迪，失去了最大电动汽车制造商的地位。
item.author: Akash Sriram

item.title: 独家：电子游戏规则引发骚乱后中国撤职官员
item.description: China removed an official at a government body overseeing its press and publications regulator, five sources who were briefed on the matter said, days after Chinese gaming stocks were hit by proposed rules to curb spending on video games.翻译:五位了解此事的消息人士称，中国解除了负责新闻出版监管机构的一名官员的职务，几天前，中国游戏股受到拟议的限制视频游戏支出规则的打击。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 2023 年全球工厂活动温和结束
item.description: Global factories had a weak finish to 2023, with euro zone activity contracting for an 18th straight month in December and Asia's manufacturing powerhouses taking a hit due to China's patchy economic recovery.翻译:到 2023 年，全球工厂表现疲软，欧元区 12 月活动连续第 18 个月萎缩，亚洲制造业强国因中国经济复苏不稳而受到打击。
item.author: Indradip Ghosh, Sam Holmes

item.title: 调查显示，2023年中国国有开发商将主导销售和土地市场
item.description: China's property market continued to consolidate in 2023 with state-affiliated firms dominating the home sales and land acquisition market, private surveys showed, as more private firms got embroiled in the sector's deepening debt crisis.翻译:私人调查显示，随着越来越多的私营企业卷入该行业不断加深的债务危机，2023年中国房地产市场继续整合，国有企业主导了房屋销售和土地收购市场。
item.author: Reuters
